Designed for running, training and yoga, our sweat-wicking Challenger Shorts keep it light and right with a relaxed over-layer and under-layer tights for support that helps you get the most out of your movement. We geared them for more than running, with a comfortable pocket that won't irritate when you move from the track to the gym.

fields.name: NIKE Women's Legend Essential 3 Sneaker
fields.description: Nike Legend Essential 3 allows you to give the best during the courses or become stronger in the weight room. The Ape Anti -abrasion honeycomb mesh and the resistant external layers on the sides and on the back will give you the determination so as never to give up. The design envelops the heel, while the flat sole ensures stability during squats and weight lifting. The carvings in the sole under the tip of the foot guarantee flexibility during folding, planks and agility exercises. The exceptional traction ensures freedom of movement on all types of surfaces that you will find in a gym.

fields.name: NIKE Women's Tanjun Trainer
fields.description: The Nike Tanjun Women's Trainers combine style and performance for an exceptional athletic experience. Featuring a sleek design with a breathable mesh upper, these trainers offer lightweight comfort and excellent ventilation. The responsive cushioning and durable rubber outsole provide optimal support and traction, making them ideal for both casual wear and intense workouts. With the iconic Nike swoosh, the Tanjun Women's Trainers seamlessly blend fashion and function, making them a versatile choice for the modern active woman.

fields.name: Under Armour Womens Charged Pursuit 3 Big Logo Running Shoes
fields.description:
Under Armour Women's UA W Charged Pursuit 3 BL - Engineered for a comfortable, lightweight, and ultra-responsive feel

Rack up the miles with ease in the Under Armour Women's UA W Charged Pursuit 3 BL sports shoes. Light, flexible, and incredibly comfortable, the women's sneakers are exactly what's needed to ascend to new heights. A performance mesh upper provides a light, breathable feel and a Charged Cushioning midsole protects, absorbs, and responds on every step. Run for longer as the deluxe foam sockliner moulds to the foot for added underfoot comfort. Just like the feel, the fit is comfortable with a foam padding around the ankle collar and under the tongue. Finished with a durable outsole pattern for greater flex and traction. Slip them on and make each step more comfortable, lighter, and responsive.

Under Armour's women's running footwear is engineered for a soft, comfortable, responsive feel - ideal for runners who want a lightweight, performance-boosting shoe.

UNDER ARMOUR MAKES ATHLETES BETTER.

fields.name: NIKE Womens Air Zoom Pegasus 38 Running Trainers
fields.description: Take strength with the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 shoe. Ensuring the fit loved by the runners. The shoe is equipped with a cushioning unit on the forefoot and foam for maximum responsiveness. The result is a durable lightweight shoe designed for your everyday runs. Nike React foam in midsole for lightness. elasticity and strength. More foam means more cushioning. No bulk. The Air Zoom unit in the forefoot is twice as large as the previous versions. This provides greater elasticity with every step. It is closer to the foot for better reactivity.

fields.name: IECCP Workout Shirts for Women Long Sleeve Athletic Top

fields.name: Under Armour Men UA BOXED SPORTSTYLE, Stylish and Comfortable T Shirt for Men
fields.description:
Comfortable and Chic – Who said exercise clothes have to be boring? This t-shirt combines style and comfort to create the ultimate in activewear.
    
Stylish Graphic Design – The casual t shirt features a large, sky-blue graphic logo emblazoned on the front. It is eye-catching and unique.
   
Breathable Material – The graphic t shirt is crafted from soft, stretchy and breathable material. It won't let perspiration build up during exercise.
    
Loose, Wide Cut – This running shirt is designed to be loose and wide-fitting, allowing for freedom of movement during times of activity and sport.
    
Material & Fit – Under Armour Boxed Sportstyle SS short-sleeve t-shirt, men's athletic wear. Fit: loose. Material: 6% Cotton and 4% Polyester

fields.name: Gaiatiger 3 Pack Gym Shirts Men Quick Dry Running Tops
fields.description:

Crew Neck & Loose style: This fitness tee is designed for a comfortable workout experience. The crew neckline is informal, while the short sleeves provide a wider range of motion, allowing it to be worn as a sweatshirt or as an underlayer for a jacket
    
Quick-drying and breathable: Men's short-sleeved running jersey has a breathable mesh design that quickly wicks away excess sweat and prevents body odours from lingering on the fabric
   
Stretch Fabric: This men's technical jersey is made from a unique 4-way stretch fabric that absorbs sweat and dries quickly to keep you cool and comfortable during your workout

fields.description:

Any combination of 9 colors, the S-6XL is suitable for various chest sizes, and we provide you with a comprehensive selection. Come and choose your wardrobe partner according to your preferences and body shape!

fields.name: York Perform Multi Gym
fields.description: The York Perform multi gym is a quality mid-range machine with 100kg (220lbs) weight stack, designed to offer you a safe and versatile workout. It offers a maximum resistance of 100kg (220lbs) on all its workout stations among which you can find chest press, peck deck, leg extension, arm curl, low rowing position and lat pull. A smooth workout has been ensured due to sealed bearings that prevent pulling or sticking while the translucent weight stack shroud and Y-frame design provide enhanced stability and support. Separate press and pec arms of the multigym enable you to perform each exercise without leaving your seat as there is no need for mechanism changes.

fields.name: HOMCOM Multi-Exercise Gym Workout Station, 45Kg Weight Stack Training System, Full Body Fitness for Home Gym
fields.description:
Multi-function design: This home GYM power tower station can support many different kinds of exercises such as back pull bar, butterfly arm, lower pull bar function, bend arm training, kick training. You can use it to train your arms, legs, waist, hips, and abdomen
    
Sturdy construction: This home workouts station is made of a strong steel tube with a sturdy structure, the counterweight block protective by steel mesh guarantying your training to the greatest extent and provide you with a long time of service. Non-slip feet pad ensures the extra stability
   
Dual upper body exercise: The large home GYM machine equipped with a dual function press arm, allows you to engage in an upper body workout without changing position or stations and allows you to perform chest presses and independent fly exercises
    
Comfortable leg developer: The multiple homes GYM equipment with 4 roller padding and a fully functional leg developer for a comfortable strength-training experience, the additional dual-function leg developer allows you to execute leg extensions
    
Dimensions: Overall Dimension: 150L x 110W x 210H cm, Seat Dimension: 35L x 32W x 4T cm.

fields.name: SPORTNOW Multi Gym Workout Station with 65kg Weight Stack, Sit Up Bench, Push Up Stand, Dip Station, Adjustable, Full Body Strength Training for Home Gym
fields.description:
Versatile training options: Engage in a variety of exercises like lat pulldowns, chest presses, leg extensions and more for a comprehensive strength-training regimen with this all-in-1 home gym machine.
    
Comprehensive strength system: This lat pulldown machine features 65kg weight stacks for customizable resistance, targeting multiple body parts including legs, arms and core for a full-body workout at home.
    
Adjustable comfort: This home multi gym boasts a height-adjustable arm curl pad and elbow pads to suit various body sizes, plus a sit-up bench with four height settings for optimal exercise alignment.
    
Enhanced comfort: Exercise with ease thanks to the thick padded seat and backrest of this smith machine, designed to support up to three users simultaneously.
    
Dimensions: 200H x 225L x 175Wcm. Maximum load 110kg.

fields.name: Marcy GS99 Dual Stack Home Gym (Leg Press, 2 Users), 2 x 65 kg
fields.description:
Strengthen your upper body with improved shoulder strength and muscle mass.
Shoulder presses are the best way to isolate the deltoid.
The multi-grip handles to target all areas of the shoulder muscles
Shoulder presses will also build size in your upper rear arm muscles (triceps).

Strong, solid arm muscles are developed by curls.
The preacher curl pad will help you isolate the upper front arm and forearms.
The Leg Developer will isolate hamstrings and quadriceps

The GS99 features both press and fly station to target your major chest muscles.
Building a bigger, stronger chest adds size to your shoulders and triceps and adds width to the top of your body.

Dual stack design allows two users at the same time
User one can train their legs and shoulders whilst user two can work on their chest, arms and back muscles.

Ensuring your body is in the correct position not only aids comfort but also maximises workout potential.
Simple and easy to adjust seat pads with fast and secure pop-pin hardware.

fields.name: BRAINGAIN Adjustable Dumbbells Set 24kg Pair | Space Saving Adjustable Weights for Home Gym
fields.description:
WORKOUT SMARTER: With BRAINGAIN's 24kg Adjustable Dumbbell Set, seamlessly switch between 15 different weights in seconds. Innovatively designed and quality tested, these adjustable dumbbells ensure the highest level of safety, empowering both beginners and professionals. Elevate your fitness routine with the best-in-class adjustable dumbbells for home workouts.
    
15 WEIGHTS IN ONE: Focus on your form with our advanced locking system that keeps the weights secure. Easily adjust from 5kg to 24kg in precise increments (2.5kg, 3.5kg, 4.5kg, 5.5kg, 6.5kg, 8kg, 9kg, 10kg, 11.5kg, 13.5kg, 16kg, 18kg, 20.5kg, 22.5kg and 24kg) to suit your training needs.
    
SAVE SPACE, ACHIEVE MORE: Replace bulky dumbbell racks and multiple traditional dumbbells with our adjustable dumbbell pair. With its compact design, it eliminates clutter and maximises efficiency, allowing you to seamlessly progress without the need for numerous individual weights. Whether you're strength training, toning, or building muscle, this all-in-one solution adapts as you grow stronger, giving you a powerful, clutter-free home gym setup.
    
ULTIMATE DURABILITY: Crafted for long-lasting performance, our premium cast iron adjustable weights come with a knurled, non-slip handle for a secure grip. Perfect for presses, swings, deadlifts, and more, this set is designed to endure a lifetime of workouts, evolving with you to meet all your training goals.
    
PERFECT FOR ALL LEVELS: Elevate your home gym with BRAINGAIN adjustable dumbbells, perfect for beginners to pros. Adaptable to any fitness level, this set replaces individual weights like 12.5kg, 15kg and 20kg pairs, offering a versatile, all-in-one workout solution.

fields.name: Smart Dumbbell Set 24Kg
fields.description: Smart Dumbbell Tower includes: 2 x 2.0kg, 2 x 4.0kg & 2 x 6.0kg Total weight of smart dumbbells - 24kg Total delivered weight 25.5kg – carton size L19.0 x W53.5 x H41.5cm Dumbbells are versatile and easy-to-use weights that let you create a variety of different workout exercises to improve your health Dumbbells are also an ideal way to improve bone health for seniors Using the dumbbells will help to tone arms and upper body muscles Perfect for use at home or at the gym class Approx. product size assembled – L35.8 x W27.5 x H38cm

fields.name: Northdeer Steel Dumbbells Ultracompact Adjustable 2.5kg 5kg 7.5kg 10kg Chrome Dumbbell pair with Foam Handles Home Gym Workout
fields.description:
ULTRA COMPACT SIZE – IMPROVE EXERCISE EFFECT: The dumbbells are made of high-quality steel, compact in size, and easy to grasp. Conventional dumbbells are bulky and limiting in terms of training movements as they often bump into the body during exercise. Using this dumbbell the movements can be more precise, deepening the muscle stimulation and enhancing the training effect.
    
INNOVATIVE DESIGN (PATENTED) - FOR SAFE TRAINING: The weights are precisely cut from solid steel without any welding. Each weight is locked to the next, avoiding the problems of traditional dumbbells in which the dumbbell piece shakes due to a loose nut. The elastic foam handles provide extra comfort and protect your hands during your workout.
    
SUITABLE FOR HOME USE: The dumbbells are compact and can stand upright, so they are easy to store at home. They are made of steel without rubber layer and will not emit unpleasant odors, which would usually affect the mood of your exercise. The minimalist shape and highly polished surface make dumbbells look like artworks at home. The attached big rubber rings can be easily installed in the grooves of the dumbbells to prevent them from scratching the floor.
    
EASY WEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: With its no nut design, just unscrew the weight plates to quickly adjust the weight. Each 10kg dumbbell can be adjusted to 3.5kg, 5kg, 7kg, 8kg, 10kg.
    
TOP QUALITY - EXTRA LONG LIFE: Dumbbells are important training equipment for long-term use. We have therefore selected more sophisticated production processes and high-quality materials that are many times more expensive than conventional dumbbells. An excellent dumbbell not only improves the training effect, but also allows you to enjoy the training.

fields.name: Dumbbell Weights Set and Storage Rack Tree Hex Dumbbells
fields.description:
Extreme Fitness Rubber Dumbbell Hex Weights & Rack - 7 Sets that include a pair of: 2.5kg 5kg 7.5kg 10kg 15kg 20kg 25kg weights & storage rack
    
Durable rubber coated dumbbells with an ergo designed handle with a great knurl for grip.
    
The Extreme Fitness 7 Pair Hex Dumbbell Set With Rack let's you store a wide range of weights in a compact space. The dumbbell tower rack does not take much room and can be placed out of the way.
    
Rack Dimensions: 73 x 50 x 76.5 cm / 28.7 x 19.7 x 30.1’’ (WxDxH)

fields.name: Core Balance Dumbbell Set Hex Weight Neoprene Coated Cast Iron Strength Training (1kg, 2kg, 3kg, 4kg, 5kg, 6kg, 7kg, 8kg, and 10kg)
fields.description:
CORE BALANCE HEX DUMBBELLS SET: With their heavy-duty cast-iron core and soft-grip neoprene coating, these Hex Dumbbells from Core Balance are perfectly balanced and supremely comfortable to use. The dumbbells have a purple neoprene coating and are labelled with their weight to easily identify them from others in the Core Balance range.
    
ANTI-ROLL HEXAGONAL PLATES: The hex dumbbells have fixed hexagonal plates to stop them rolling along the floor and keep them within easy reach if you’re doing circuit training and other workouts. They’re perfect for floor-based circuits, such as dumbbell push-ups. Their anti-roll design also makes them easy to store and stack with other hex dumbbells.
    
SOFT-GRIP NEOPRENE COATING: The dumbbells have a neoprene coating which makes them more comfortable to hold than standard cast-iron or rubber-coated dumbbells. Perfect if you’re doing circuits and regularly picking them up and putting them down. Neoprene also retains its grip if your hands are sweaty and can be easily wiped clean after every workout.
    
HEAVY-DUTY CAST-IRON CORE: Cast-iron dumbbells are stronger than vinyl-coated dumbbells which are often filled with concrete and are prone to chipping and cracking over time. The heavy-duty cast-iron core also gives the dumbbells a perfectly balanced weight which helps to reduce the strain on your joints and muscles when you’re working out.
   
CHOOSING DUMBBELL WEIGHTS: If you’re a female with little experience of strength training, start with 1kg dumbbells and slowly work your way up to 5kg dumbbells as your strength improves. For males, 5kg dumbbells are a good starting point and a top choice for sculpting your muscles, whereas heavier weights are better for bulking up and building strength.

fields.name: Yaheetech 2x10kg (Sold in Pair) Dumbbells Set Arm Hand Weight Dumbbell Hexagon Dumbbell for Strength Training
fields.description:
Specification: Grip length: 10.6cm (each); Overall length: 34.5cm (each)

Ergonomic Design: Comfortable hand grip. Each is 10.6cm/4.2” long with a weight of 10kg/22lb. Easy to grip, nonslip and heavy enough for arm muscle workout
    
Antiroll Handle: Hex weight heads don’t roll on uneven workout surface. PVC coating over the heads serve as a protective layer to reduce dents and scratches in the floor
   
Multipurpose Fitness Dumbbell: Iron dumbbells great for muscle building. Ideal for heavy-duty weightlifters and body builders. Will fit in home, gyms, clubs, studios, fitness classes
    
2pcs for One Pack: Indoor/outdoor hand weights easy to store and perfect for travel. Will help you build muscle mass for cardio training. Weight visible on dumbbell heads for reference
    
Durable Material: Selected cast iron dumbbells filled with concrete. Coated with fine black PVC covering over the heads to absorb impact and protect floor if it falls

fields.name: Amonax 30kg Cast Iron Adjustable Dumbbells Weight Set, Barbell Set Men Women, Strength Training Equipment Home Gym Fitness, Dumbell Pair Hand Weight, Bar Bells Free Weights for Weight Lifting
fields.description: [IN THE BOX] - You will receive 8 x 2.5kg cast iron 1 inch weight plates for 20kg weights set (and 8 for 30kg weights set), 4x 1.25kg dumbbell plates, 4 x 0.5kg dumbbell weight plates, 2 x dumbell bars, 1 x chrome dumbbell barbell connector, 4 steel spinlock collars, and 1 workout guide. Amonax dumbbell weights set can be great free weights for men and exercise weights for women.

fields.name: PhysKcal Hex Dumbbells Set, Odourless Poly Rubber Encased Dumbbells 10KG Pair, Home Gym Weights Set
fields.description:
Let’s say no to eye-watering smell or linger-on-hands odours of traditional rubber dumbbells! Wrapped in a 8-mm thick poly coating of NBR and PVC over-molded injection mixture, these hex dumbbells are extremely low-odour and slightly harder compared to traditional bells.

The hexagonal shape prevents the training aid from rolling and opens a world of possibilities for exercises using the dumbbells set as handles such as renegade rows, dumbbell clean and jerk, burpees over dumbbells, etc. The flat edge of the shape also makes it easier to store.

These poly hex dumbbells feature a high grade steel and solid cast-iron core for an even weight distribution, longevity and durability, and the proprietary head to handle construction ensures the head does not come loose. Besides, the 8-mm thick coating protects home and gym floors from impact damage during use, and keeps your training quiet by absorbing the shock.

The chrome-plated handles are ergonomically designed, and knurled for a firm and secure grip. There are no logos or branding on these dumbbells but only weight indications are embossed on both sides of each head.

PhysKcal introduces Poly Hex Dumbbells as a great, budget-priced option that still delivers on quality, performance, and longevity.

fields.name: Peloton Indoor Exercise Bike
fields.description:
GAME-CHANGING CARDIO – Clip into the Peloton Bike for a workout experience that goes beyond cycling, whether you’re cruising or sprinting, as you climb the Leaderboard with other Members
    
SMALL-SPACE FRIENDLY – Peloton Bike has a compact, 120 cm x 60 cm footprint, and an adjustable seat, handlebar, and screen, which tilts to accommodate different heights. This stationary bike fits comfortably in your home whether you’re low on space or working around furniture.
    
CONTROLS & FEATURES – Peloton Bike features a resistance knob for manual control, 2-channel rear-facing stereo speaker system with 16 watts of total power, 10-point multitouch touchscreen, USB microport, 3.5 mm headphone jack, Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity, 5 megapixel front-facing camera, built-in microphone, and up and down volume buttons.
    
VALUE-PACKED MEMBERSHIP – A Peloton All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton content on your Bike. You’ll pay £39/mo for your entire household and get unlimited access to our entire library of content available on your Bike and the Peloton App. Age, height, and weight restrictions apply. Your account can be activated during Bike setup.
    
MEASUREMENTS & REQUIREMENTS – We require leaving 60 cm on all four sides to store and train on your Bike. Keeping your Bike in a room with a minimum ceiling height of 250 cm will ensure adequate headroom while riding. Dimensions: 150 cm L x 135 cm H x 58 cm W; Screen: 21.5” diagonal; Weight: 61 kg; Power cord length: 25 cm.
    
WHAT’S IN THE BOXES – You’ll get step-by-step instructions to make assembly easy. Bike frame, stabilisers, handlebars, water bottle holders, pedals, weight holders, touchscreen, and toolkit are included. Some parts are located in the touchscreen box. Be sure to check both boxes for all parts before throwing away. Shoes, mat, and other accessories sold separately.
    
USER REQUIREMENTS – Height range: 150 cm - 195 cm; weight maximum: 135 kg; age minimum: 14.

fields.name: Wenoker Exercise Bike Indoor Cycling, Spin Bike Exercise Equipment for Home Gym Use with LCD Display & Tablet Holder Fitness Workout Cardio Training Machine
fields.description:
[Solid Build Indoor Exercise Bike]: Wenoker released this upgraded exercise bike with thicker heavy duty aluminum steel construction and updated 7-shaped front handlebar post knob to ensure the exercise bike sits firmly on the floor so it won't rock or wobble while you ride. Sleek black and red styling will look chic in your home or workout space. Perfect exercise equipment for home use.
    
[More Stable, Quiet & Smooth]: Unlike the deceptive bikes online that are with a noisy iron sand flywheel, this indoor cycling bike inertia-enhanced flywheel maintains a quiet smooth motion. Without the problem of a belt pulley breaking, a belt falling off, belt debris falling, or the loud noise of the old version's felt pad, our exercise bike uses ABS material belt pulley, industrial-grade bearings and upgraded Felt Pad Brake, making the bike more reliable and more suitable for shared spaces.
    
[LCD Monitor & Tablet Holder]: Multi-Functional LCD monitor that displays time, speed, distance, odometer and calories burned. With this functional modes, you can easily get all the training data. Besides, WENOKER spin bike comes with a tablet holder, water bottle holder and caged pedals. Extended reach from saddle to handlebar enables space for all sizes of riders. The handlebars have a light spongy coating that protects the bars and makes you feel more comfortable while riding.
    
[Customized Your Exercise Plan]: Using this cycling bike to record your exercise plan in time and can offer several benefits. It can let you burn fat fast, strengthen your heart, lungs, muscles, etc. The resistance system of the cycling bike gives you a real-road feeling. You can control the intensity of exercise by increasing or decreasing resistance, pushing down emergency brake will bring the bike to an immediate stop. It is suitable for both beginners and professional cyclists.
    
[Reliable Customer Service] Wenoker provides free parts replacement for 12 months. 70% pre-assembled exercise bike comes with tools pack which allows you to install in 20 mins. If you have any questions, please contact us. The factory engineer provides professional guidance on video. Double guarantee of quality and service. Even can't access a studio, you can boost immunity, strengthen heart and lungs and muscles, perfect for your family health. Choose WENOKER won't let you down.

fields.name: LABGREY Exercise Bike Indoor Cycling Bike Stationary Cycle Bike with Heart Rate Sensor & Comfortable Seat Cushion, Quiet Fitness Bike for Home Cardio Workout
fields.description:
LABGREY exercise bike comes with an upgraded digital LCD monitor that tracks your time, speed, distance, odometer (lifetime miles ridden), pulse and estimated calories burned. It also includes contact heart rate sensors on the handlebars to track your heart rate. This indoor bike has two device holders (phone holder and tablet holder), so you can enjoy music or video while exercising.
    
[Best Stationary Bike]: Want your indoor ride to simulate an outdoor experience? Consider this stationary bike from LABGREY. The resistance system gives you a real-road feeling. You can control the intensity of exercise by increasing or decreasing resistance, pushing down emergency brake will bring the bike to an immediate stop. This indoor bike is suitable for both beginners and professional cyclists. It lets you burn fat fast, strengthen your heart, lungs, and muscles.
    
[Sturdy Indoor Cycling Bike]: This solid and sturdy bike is designed to perform at the highest levels and is excellent for high intensity and steady state types of training. It has a 35 pounds flywheel and supports a maximum capacity of 350 pounds. Heavy-duty steel frame gives you the stability you need. The belt drive system creates an unbelievably smooth and nearly silent ride which allows you to train without disturbing anyone around you.
    
[Personalized Fitness Bike]: LABGREY indoor cycle is perfect for any gym or for home use. Multi-position handlebars and adjustable seats fit people approximately 4'5"to 6'. This exercise bike uses a thickened pure wool brake pad, which is less noisy, has no flavor and is more durable. The adjustable cage pedals on this stationary bike protect you from a fast ride. The water bottle holder allows you to replenish water in time. Transport wheels help you easily move this cycle machine.
    
[Free Lifetime Warranty]: Online instruction video can help you complete the assembly within 30 minutes. All LABGREY users that purchase exercise bike will receive our exclusive lifetime warranty package. LABGREY is the only company in the world that offers a lifetime warranty for every client and has for nearly 30 years. Because a lifelong fitness journey requires lifelong support – and that’s the LABGREY promise.

fields.name: Sunny Health & Fitness Pro Cycling Stationary Bike, 40LB Flywheel & 4-Way Adjustable Seat for Home Exercise & Indoor Cycle/Cardio Workout, Optional 49 LB Flywheel Belt Drive
fields.description:
【Heavy-Duty 49 LB Flywheel】This exercise bike is equipped with a 49 lbs heavy-duty flywheel that delivers a natural, smooth, and consistent cycling workout.

【Authentic Experience】Micro-adjustable leather resistance that simulates real road biking, giving you an immersive and authentic riding experience at home.

【Ergonomic Design】High-quality non-slip handlebar and micro-adjustable leather resistance deliver a comfortable and authentic workout experience at home, reducing fatigue during extended sessions.

【Quiet Operation】Features a belt drive system for a quieter and smoother workout, allowing you to focus on your exercise without any distracting noise.

【Customizable Comfort】Offers a 4-way adjustable seat and a 2-way adjustable handlebar to tailor the workout to your specific needs and preferences.

【Superior Capacity】With a strong and durable heavy-duty frame, this stationary bike can accommodate a maximum user weight of up to 275 lbs.

【Secure Ride】Comes with caged pedals for enhanced security and safety stop feature to quickly halt the spinning motion.

fields.name: Decorcn Folding Treadmill for Home, 4.5HP, 20 Incline Levels, 1km/h-16km/h, 150KG limited, Runnig Machine with LED, Bluetooth Speakers
fields.description:
2024 NEW Treadmills for home foldable: Decorcn specializes in the production of premium fitness equipment. After collaborating with numerous gyms and conducting extensive testing with a hundred fitness coaches and two thousand fitness enthusiasts, we have developed a cutting-edge treadmill that guarantees exceptional performance. This treadmill features a high-quality wide running belt, a 4.5HP ultra-quiet motor.

Adjustable Treadmill with Incline: Our treadmills offer effortless adjustment of incline levels from 0 to 20, allowing you to tailor your workout according to your training plan. And 12 preset programs for you to use, to satisfy your daily exercise, whether it is walking, jogging or running(NOTE: There are 20 incline levels on our treadmill. The incline mode of the original recline level 0 is 2.2 degrees and 5.4 degrees for level 20).

Super-Wide Running Surface: With a load capacity of 150KG and equipped with a 120 x 45 cm wide running belt, this running machines for home provides a comfortable running space. The 6-layer elastic running belt, professional buffer framework, and shock-absorbing rubber soles offer excellent shock absorption, thereby reducing joint stress and protecting our knees and ankles from injury, Furthermore, it comes with Bluetooth music playback, allowing you to enjoy your favorite tunes while working out.

Folding, Space-saving Treadmill for Home Use: Decorcn's home treadmill features an inclined folding hydraulic system that allows for easy and safe folding. The treadmill is equipped with four compact transport wheels, making it effortless to move and store the treadmill without damaging the floor. It is ideal for home workouts and fitness activities.

Shock Absorption & Noise Reduction Treadmill for Heavy People: The running belt on Decorcn's incline treadmill is specifically designed for comfort, durability, and noise reduction. It is built to last and enhance your athletic performance while protecting your joints. With a powerful 4.5 horsepower motor, it provides both energy efficiency and ultra-quiet operation, measuring at approximately less than 60 decibels. This allows you to enjoy a healthy lifestyle.

5-Year Parts & Motor Cover: We have A professional after-sales team. Not only buying this multifunctional walking treadmill but also get the best quality service. If for some reason the foldable treadmill isn't working out for you, contact us for Quickly responsive.

fields.name: 2 In 1 Home Folding Treadmill, Dual LED Screen, 2.5HP Silent Treadmill, 16KM/H, Bluetooth Speaker, Heart Rate, 12 Modes, App and Wireless Remote Control
fields.description:
【2 In 1 Home Treadmill】The Folding Treadmill for home has 12 preset programs, providing 12 exercise modes. It can be used as a walking mat with a speed of 1-8KM/H or as a treadmill with a speed of 1-16KM/H to meet your different training needs. The Pause button allows you to take a break during your workout without worrying about your workout data being deleted

【Dual LED Screen & Dual Smart APP Control】This folding treadmill is equipped with a multifunctional dual LED screen that displays speed, distance, time and calories in real time. You can adjust the speed and mode via the touch screen or remote control on the treadmill. Home treadmill can be connected to APP such as "FITSHOW" and various training courses can be implemented at home or in the gym

【Bluetooth Speaker & Heart Rate Monitor】By connecting your phone to the treadmill's bluetooth speaker via Bluetooth, you can enjoy wonderful music during exercise. You can hold the metal sensor parts on both sides of the treadmill screen with both hands for 3 seconds to test your heart rate and monitor your fitness during exercise in real time

【2.5 HP Silent Motor & Shock Absorption System】The electric treadmill comes with a powerful 2.5 HP motor that offers a load capacity of 130 kg. The 7-layer non-slip texture running belt has a large running surface (1040*420MM). The internal silicone columns strongly absorb impacts, cushioning your knees, muscles and joints while reducing noise to avoid disturbing others

【Space-saving design and no assembly required】TOPUTURE 2 in 1 treadmill adopts advanced installation-free design. The quick release buckle can instantly transform a 1330*718*130MM walking mat into a 1257*718*1105MM treadmill. This home treadmill weighs 34.5KG and the bottom transport wheels make it easy to transport and fold it to store under a table or sofa to save space

fields.name: Folding Treadmill for Home, Motorized Jogging Running Machine, Build in Bluetooth dual Speaker Multi-functional Display & Heart-rate Sensor, 95% pre-assembled
fields.description:
【12 MONTHS WARRANTY】Contact us to get timely solution & lifetime friendly customer support. From shipping damage and parts issues to product use, installation and maintenance. Laufhome promises to solve all your problems in the most professional way!

【FOLDING TREADMILL】The treadmill with 95% pre-installed. Only need to put screws on, the tool bag is included. The hydraulic system guarantees safe and hands-free unfolding just kick the pole. The built-in transportation wheels allow for effortless movement or storage. Additionally, the individual easy-self lubrication hole makes maintenance a breeze.

【PULSE SENSORS】Keep track of your target heart rate in real-time with the built-in handrail heart sensors. Monitoring your pulse rate during exercise ensures you're working out correctly and efficiently. Advanced Multi-functional LCD Display clearly shows time, speed, distance and calories, monitoring your progress in real time and keeping your movement data at a glance.

【INCLINE TREADMILL】Customize the intensity of your workout with 3 different manual incline positions. Simulate the challenge of running uphill and feel the burn in your leg muscles as you push yourself to new heights.

【NON-SLIP &SHOCK ABSORPTION】The running belt has a wide running area (110 x 40 cm) that provides effective, safe cushioning for knees and muscles for a superior running experience.

【QUIET BRUSHLESS MOTOR & STURDY CONSTRUCTION】3.25HP Powerful Motor allows users to perform more challenging workouts from beginner to advanced intensity. Maximum weight capacity: 300 Ibs. Maximum speed: 12 KM/H while the tubular steel construction and wide base provide safe stability and long-lasting durability for reduced maintenance costs.

fields.name: ALLYLIKE Walking treadmill Anti-slip Shock-absorbing Treadmill Foldable Electric Walking Machine Treadmill Home Fitness Equipment Commercial Treadmill
fields.description:
Providing a speed adjustment, a leisure mode, a walking mode, and a running mode, it is enough to meet your needs!

The new upgrade is only to make you more comfortable
Encrypted elastic running board
Multi-layer shock-absorbing wear-resistant non-slip

Good motor mute does not disturb people

Suitable for walking, jogging, and running. Whether you are at home or in the office, the can meet your needs.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro Grey with Galaxy AI, Wireless Earbuds, Noise Cancelling, Bluetooth, 360 Audio, Hi-Fi Sound
fields.description:
Iconic Design with Blade Lights: Experience optimal sound with our new design. Galaxy Buds3 Pro feature small angled heads for a comfortable fit & to streamline your audio experience while blade lights let you express yourself. Comes with a sleek, curved case with transparent cover.¹ ² ³
    
Immersive Sound with Ultimate Hi-Fi: Retain ultra-high quality audio from the recording studio to your Galaxy Buds3 Pro. The Samsung Seamless Codec compresses and encodes up to 24bit/ 96kHz, high fidelity sound so you can hear the intricate details, just as it was intended.⁴
    
Adaptive Noise Control: Wear Galaxy Buds3 & continue to engage with the world around you. Using Galaxy AI, Galaxy Buds3 Pro identifies & prevents unnecessary noise. Optimises audio by re-adjusting balance between ANC & Ambient Mode to correspond with your surroundings.⁵ ⁶ ⁷
   
Galaxy AI-Powered Sound: Delve into your personal soundscape with Galaxy AI-assisted Adaptive EQ/ Adaptive ANC. AI-boosted algorithm analyses sound detected through the mics in real-time then optimises your listening experience by adjusting the sound to conform to your fit.⁸
   
What's in the box: 1 pair of Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro in Grey, charging dock, charging cable, various ear tip sizes and user manual.

fields.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds
fields.description:
GROUNDBREAKING SOUND—AirPods Pro 2 with hearing health features including Loud Sound Reduction, Conversation Boost and Background Sounds
   
INTELLIGENT NOISE CONTROL — Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise. Transparency mode lets you hear the world around you, and Adaptive Audio seamlessly blends Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode for the best listening experience in any environment. And when you’re speaking to someone nearby, Conversation Awareness automatically lowers the volume of what’s playing
  
IMPROVED SOUND AND CALL QUALITY — The Apple-designed H2 chip helps to create deeply immersive sound. The low-distortion, custom-built driver delivers crisp, clear high notes and full, rich bass in stunning definition. Voice Isolation improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions
    
CUSTOMISABLE FIT — Includes four pairs of silicone tips (XS, S, M, L) to fit a wide range of ear shapes and provide all-day comfort. The tips create an acoustic seal to help keep out noise and secure AirPods Pro 2 in place
   
DUST, SWEAT AND WATER RESISTANT — Both AirPods Pro 2 and the MagSafe Charging Case are IP54 dust, sweat and water resistant, so you can listen comfortably in more conditions
    
PERSONALISED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Pro 2 deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. 3 You can also listen to selected songs, shows and movies in Dolby Atmos
    
A HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL — Simply swipe, press and hold the stem to manage playback functions using Touch control. And with Siri Interactions, simply nod your head yes or shake your head no when Siri asks if you’d like to hear a message, answer a call or manage a notification

fields.name: Google Pixel Watch 3 (45 mm) – Android smartwatch with heart rate tracking, advanced running from Fitbit, fitness insights, 24-hour battery – Polished Silver Aluminium Case – Porcelain band – Wi-Fi
fields.description:
The Google Pixel Watch 3 is designed for performance, with a bigger, brighter screen, advanced fitness from Fitbit and everyday help from Google.
   
Twice as bright, 40% more display and more responsive than before – the Actua screen is designed to make it easy to see your stats and info.
    
The 45 mm Pixel Watch 3 screen is over 40% larger than before, making room for richer, glanceable info during exercise, in Maps and more.
    
You bring the effort, the Pixel Watch 3 brings the expertise. Build run workouts and get real-time guidance and advanced form tracking.
   
Build the ideal run routine – warm-ups, cool-downs, intervals and pace & HR targets. Then access saved workouts on your watch to beat your PRs.
    
Google AI uses your goals, past runs and readiness to power personalised run recommendations with real-time, on-wrist coaching.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch7 Green with Galaxy AI, Smart Watch, Health Monitoring, Fitness Tracker, 40mm, LTE
fields.description:
Galaxy AI Understand your body better and start your day smarter with Energy Score. Check your sleep, heart rate and daily activities with energy score and plan your routine each day. Didn't rest well? Maybe skip the gym and relax at home to get back on track.¹
   
Personalised Sleep Coaching: A better bedtime routine starts with Sleep Tracking. Get a daily sleep score, your sleep heart rate, personalised Sleep Coaching and more. Understand your nightly patterns accurately and get tips that help you to enhance your sleep.² ³ ⁴ ⁵
   
Advanced Fitness Tracking: Take your fitness game to the next level with Galaxy Watch7. Create your ideal workout routine with warm-ups, cooldowns and breaks in between. Compete with your past records to stay motivated. Easily track your exercise in water with WaterLock Mode.⁶ ⁷ ⁸ ⁹
    
Next Level Processing Power: The new 3NM processor supercharges your daily routine. Quickly switch from checking the weather to tracking your workouts in no time. Plus it optimises battery life for long-lasting power, ensuring the Galaxy Watch7 keeps up with you. ¹⁰ ¹¹
    
What's in the box: 1x Samsung Galaxy Watch7, 40mm, Bluetooth, Green, Charging Cable (Micro USB) and User Manual.

fields.name: Google Fitbit Versa 4 Fitness Smartwatch with built-in GPS and up to 6 days battery life - compatible with iOS 15 or higher & Android OS 9.0 or higher
fields.description:
6+ days of battery and Water-resistant up to 50m
   
Compatible with Apple iOS 15 o superiore. Android OS 10 o superiore
    
Built for better fitness results: Daily Readiness Score, built-in GPS and workout intensity map, Active Zone Minutes, all-day activity tracking and 24/7 heart rate, 40+ exercise modes and automatic exercise tracking
   
Tools to measure and improve sleep quality: personalized Sleep Profile, Daily Sleep Stages & Sleep Score, smart wake alarm and do not disturb mode
    
Maintaining a healthy body and mind: daily Stress Management Score, reflection logging, SpO2, health metrics dashboard, guided breathing sessions, menstrual health tracking and mindfulness content
    
Designed for fitness & beyond: on-wrist Bluetooth calls, texts, phone notifications, customizable clock faces and always-on display mode, thin, lightweight and water resistant to 50 meters, 6+ day battery & fast charge
    
Includes 6-month Premium membership for deeper insights & guidance, exclusive workouts, mindfulness sessions and more

fields.name: ULTRAHUMAN Ring AIR-Smart Ring Health Tracker, Size First Sizing Kit,Sleep Tracker,Smart Ring for Men/Women,Fitness Tracker
fields.description:
SIZE FIRST - Ultrahuman Ring sizes are different from standard ring sizes. Purchase Ultrahuman Sizing Kit first to get the perfect Ring AIR size. Ring AIR is available in 10 sizes from 5-14.
    
THE RING OF YOUR DREAMS - Ultrahuman Ring AIR is the perfect sleep tracker ring. Along with insights on all your sleep stages — REM, Deep Sleep, Light Sleep and Wakefulness, get actionable steps to improve sleep so you're ready for the day.
    
DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU MOVING - The 'Movement Index' is designed to keep you moving all day for optimum glucose metabolism, and to increase your non-exercise energy usage through the day. With this all-in-one activity and fitness tracker, you can track steps, workouts and calories for insights into your all-day activity. All features work together seamlessly, to make sure you get the most out of the smart ring. Workout Tracking is now easy, with a dedicated Workout Mode that tracks Heart Rate during workouts — you can get insights into your cardiovascular response, track intensity levels, and make informed decisions to improve your fitness outcomes.
    
ENHANCED RECOVERY - Ring AIR is geared to help you recover better, with focused recovery tracking. The 'Dynamic Recovery Score' is derived from a blend of key metrics including heart rate monitoring, Heart Rate Variability (HRV) and skin temperature that track not only sleep but also every aspect of your lifestyle, giving you actionable insights. Designed to evolve with you, Dynamic Recovery will update in real-time when you take naps, sauna sessions or any contributors to enhance your recovery.
    
FUNCTIONALLY AESTHETIC - The Ultrahuman Ring AIR is forged with space grade titanium. Meticulously designed for enhanced comfort, this sleek device combines minimal form factor with precise performance, enabling users to effortlessly monitor key health indicators such as Sleep, Movement, Heart Rate (HR), Heart Rate Variability (HRV), and skin temperature.
    
WOMEN'S HEALTH - RING AIR incorporates cycle-based scores that uniquely characterise women’s physiology. With the Cycle Tracking PowerPlug, women get insights and personalised guidance for every phase of their cycle (Menstruation, Ovulation, Follicular, and Luteal Phases). With the Pregnancy Mode PowerPlug, expecting mothers get tailored insights throughout each trimester. With these, and more personalised features on the way, Ring AIR is undoubtedly a smart ring for women as well.
    
A UNIQUE APPROACH TO STRESS - A gamechanging perspective on stress, it considers the variations in your Heart Rate (HR), Heart Rate Variability (HRV), and Resting Heart Rate (RHR) against the backdrop of your circadian rhythm.
